bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Standard for a Protection Profile in Operational Environment A
IEEE Draft Standard for a Protection Profile in Operational Environment A
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Unapproved Draft Std P2600.1/D41c, Mar 2009

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Standard for a Protection Profile for Hardcopy Devices in a restrictive commercial information processing environment in which a relatively high level of document security, operational accountability, and information assurance, are required. Typical information processed in this environment is trade secret, mission-critical, or subject to legal and regulatory considerations such as for privacy or governance. This environment is not intended to support life-critical or national security applications. This environment will be known as ¿Operational Environment A.¿

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
